entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 22.
